content.html: Here's the thing about the #indieweb. Once you have a domain or site, you're there. From that point, you can enable whichever other building blocks you like. Or not. But just because you're not using certain building blocks doesn't mean it's not indieweb.
content.value: Here's the thing about the #indieweb. Once you have a domain or site, you're there. From that point, you can enable whichever other building blocks you like. Or not. But just because you're not using certain building blocks doesn't mean it's not indieweb.
